text: Nepes Gukulov (born 10 September 1978) is a retired Greco-Roman wrestler from Turkmenistan. He represented his country at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney as a featherweight (-58 kg), finishing 10th overall (with a 1-2 record). He is also the only Turkmen to ever medal at the World Wrestling Championships, winning a silver in 2002 in Moscow at -55 kg. He defeated defending world champion Hassan Rangraz in the semifinals before losing to Geidar Mamedaliyev in the gold medal match. ==References== ==External links== * Sports-Reference profile * Wrestling Database profile Category:Living people Category:1978 births Category:Turkmenistan male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Turkmenistan Category:Wrestlers at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:World Wrestling Championships medalists Category:Wrestlers at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Turkmenistan
title: Nepes Gukulow
